# supportsTextReplacement

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the searchable object supports replacing text.

## Declaration

```swift
var supportsTextReplacement: Bool { get }
```

## Handling replacements

- **replace(foundTextRange:document:withText:)**: Informs the searchable object to replace the text range for the highlighted search result.
- **replaceAll(queryString:options:withText:)**: Informs the searchable object to replace all matching text across all searchable documents.
- **shouldReplace(foundTextRange:document:withText:)**: Determines whether the searchable object allows replacement of the text range you provide.
